channel.title: What's The Point?
channel.managingEditor: whats-the-point@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Elan Ressel | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.description:
The guru of reward and loyalty programmes, Elan Ressel, shares his secrets with you on how to maximise the benefit you derive when you spend your hard-earned money.

Learn the best tips, tricks, hacks and secrets.

Recorded and produced at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
channel.itunes:subtitle: The guru of reward and loyalty programmes, Elan Ressel, will be sharing his secrets with you on how to maximise the benefit you derive when you spend your hard-earned money.
channel.itunes:author: Elan Ressel | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
channel.itunes:summary:
The guru of reward and loyalty programmes, Elan Ressel, shares his secrets with you on how to maximise the benefit you derive when you spend your hard-earned money.
Learn the best tips, tricks, hacks and secrets.

channel.media:keywords: Elan Ressel, points, loyalty, Another Solid Gold podcast, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard

item.author: whats-the-point@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Elan Ressel | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
item.itunes:author: Elan Ressel | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Loyalty programs in South Africa - An Introduction
item.itunes:title: Loyalty programs in South Africa - An Introduction
item.itunes:subtitle: Are YOU getting the most out of YOUR loyalty programs?
item.description:
In this introduction episode, Elan Ressel welcomes listeners to the podcast channel and introduces the concepts he has used in his own life to maximise the loyalty programs he has participated in. This has allowed him, and his family, to have some extraordinary experiences.


Engage with us on Instagram @whatsthepointafrica


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
item.content:encoded:
In this introduction episode, Elan Ressel welcomes listeners to the podcast channel and introduces the concepts he has used in his own life to maximise the loyalty programs he has participated in. This has allowed him, and his family, to have some extraordinary experiences.


Engage with us on Instagram @whatsthepointafrica


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
item.itunes:keywords: Elan Ressel, loyalty programs, travel hacking, points, miles, South Africa, Another Solid Gold Podcast, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard
